Free Single Page HTML/CSS Template

Published: December 12, 2011

I have just completed a new HTML CSS template for you to download. The site is made for those who need a simple single page web presence. The site is easy to modify and get setup. Check out the demo.

You can visit the github page here, or you can grab the zip direct here.If you like it, or use it somewhere, let me know in the comments.
